name: FGameplayCueNotify_BurstEffects
doc:
FGameplayCueNotify_BurstEffects

    Set of effects to spawn for a single event, used by all gameplay cue notify types.

BurstParticles: Particle systems to be spawned on gameplay cue execution.  These should never use looping effects!
BurstSounds: Sound to be played on gameplay cue execution.  These should never use looping effects!
BurstCameraShake: Camera shake to be played on gameplay cue execution.  This should never use a looping effect!
BurstCameraLensEffect: Camera lens effect to be played on gameplay cue execution.  This should never use a looping effect!
BurstForceFeedback: Force feedback to be played on gameplay cue execution.  This should never use a looping effect!
BurstDevicePropertyEffect: Input device properties to be applied on gameplay cue execution
BurstDecal: Decal to be spawned on gameplay cue execution.  Actor should have fade out time or override should be set so it will clean up properly.
